text: Outskirts () is a 1933 Soviet war drama movie directed by Boris Barnet.Окраина12 фильмов ММКФ It stars Sergey Komarov, Elena Kuzmina, and Robert Erdmann. ==Actors== *Sergey Komarov — Alexander P. Greshin *Elena Kuzmina — Anka Greshina *Robert Erdmann — Robert Karlovich *Alexander Chistyakov — Pyotr Kadkin *Nikolay Bogolyubov — Nikolai Kadkin *Nikolai Kryuchkov — Senka Kadkin == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1933 war movies Category:1933 drama movies Category:Russian war movies Category:Russian drama movies Category:Movies directed by Boris Barnet
title: Outskirts (1933 movie)
